20101229230445.000|20101229230446.000|CC1|ABROAD ANYWAY.

20101229230551.000|20101229230552.000|CC1|5.25%.

20101229230554.000|20101229230557.000|CC1|SUPPOSED TO BE 35%.

20101229230559.000|20101229230600.000|CC1|WORLD LOVED BUSH?

20101229230614.000|20101229230617.000|CC1|SINCE THAT HUGE 2004 TAX BREAK, 
20101229230617.000|20101229230622.000|CC1|WE HAVE LOST NEARLY 7 MILLION
